Package com.threerings.openal

Class Summary
ResourceClipProvider Loads clips from resources.
SoundClipManager  
Sounder Plays a sound.
Sounder.BaseClip Base class for Sounder.BaseClip, Sounder.MetaClip, and Sounder.VariableClip.
Sounder.BaseStream Base class for Sounder.BaseStream and Sounder.MetaStream.
Sounder.Clip Plays a sound clip.
Sounder.Compound Plays several sub-sounders at once.
Sounder.Conditional Plays the first sounder whose condition evaluates to true.
Sounder.Implementation The actual sounder implementation.
Sounder.MetaClip Plays a randomly selected clip.
Sounder.MetaStream Selects from a number of streams.
Sounder.Random Plays the first sounder whose condition evaluates to true.
Sounder.Scripted Plays a scripted sequence of sounders.
Sounder.Sequential Plays multiple sub-sounders in sequence.
Sounder.Stream Plays a sound stream.
Sounder.VariableClip Plays a clip with variable parameters.
